sen2r 0.3.2

Download and install aria2.

Source: R/install_aria2.R
install_aria2.Rd

This function download and install standalone version of aria2 for Windows.

install_aria2(aria2_dir = system.file(package = "sen2r"), force = FALSE)

Arguments

aria2_dir

(optional) Path where aria2 executable will be installed (default: the package path).
force

(optional) Logical: if TRUE, install even if it is already installed (default is FALSE).

Value

The path of aria2

Note

License: GPL 3.0

Examples

# NOT RUN {
install_aria2()
# }

Contents

  • Value
  • Note
